attributes.action: Stop the UK from Re-joining the EU
attributes.additional_details: Because we had a referendum to leave the EU, we are in a democratic country the peoples wishes are being ignored, British citizens deserve to have a say on this matter
attributes.background: To stop taking the UK back to being ruled by the EU, the British people do not want the EU making all our decisions for us, european court of justice, EU fishing our waters, freedom of movement for 18-30 year olds free NHS treatment,

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government have not announced any plans to re-join the EU.
